Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "She's on the table. Hopefully in time...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Judging from the depth of the footprints and the tracks of the rickshaw...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Gray Raven, Babylonia. Quite rare for you call on a direct line. What is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We're hoping you could retask a high-definition long-range telescope to this area.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Heat signals and biological signals of uninfected beings or groups.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Strange... the biological signals' coordinates are right on top of your own.", 4: '2'}
{3: "We may not know their exact position, but one thing's for sure: they have us surrounded."}
{3: 'With our Constructs, we can fight our way out, but that also means making enemies.'}
{3: 'After a while, a figure appears from the shadows.'}
{2: '???', 3: "So the CPF... hasn't been reactivated yet?"}
{3: "The man, clad in a tattered worker's outfit, slams a fist on the tiles nearby. If it were a human fist, it would definitely have hurt."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Ly—I mean, the little girl... How is she?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Don't worry, I just spoke with the base. She survived the operation.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The amputation. It's the only option for those infected by the Punishing Virus.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We're very sorry. We didn't have a choice...", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "I can accept that. It's a better outcome than death."}
{2: '???', 3: "I've seen them... Those who died from the Punishing Virus."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Can you explain more about that "reactivation" you mentioned?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'As you can tell, we lived in that gigantic structure where you found Ly—I mean, the girl. Unfortunately the CPF there was often out of order.'}
{2: '???', 3: "When the CPF did its job, we worked hard transporting rations and weapons out of the warehouse. Whenever it shut down, we'd have to face swarms of the Corrupted."}
{2: '???', 3: 'The most recent downtime period lasted especially long. So one day, my daughter, Lyrie... she snuck into the buildings to look for food.'}
{2: '???', 3: "On that very day, the Corrupted broke through our lines. We'd run out of ammo, so we had to leave everything and run..."}
{2: '???', 3: 'If you were telling the truth about the CPF not yet reactivating...'}
{2: '???', 3: 'All we could do was abandon all hope of returning, and carve out a living somewhere else before more of us starved.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Yeah. Your daughter is still with us, so don't go anywhere!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "She already lost a leg. She can't lose her dad too.", 4: '1'}
